package.name: Rp_Display_Price_Free
package.summary: Display product as FREE when product price is $0.00 on frontend.
package.description: Display product as FREE when product price is $0.00 on frontend. Enable or Disable extension as per requirement. Installation steps: ---------- - Its very easy to install, just copy app/ folder and paste on your magento root folder. - You are done with installation. - Login into store backend, flush all cache or disable all cache in System -> Cache Management. - Logout and login again from Backend to reload. - The extension should be installed and you can use it.
